paper_abstract: Let T be a Calderon-Zygmund operator on Heisenberg group H-d. In this paper, by wavelets, we introduce a class of pseudo-annular operators {T-R}(R >= 1) to decompose T. By controlling the bandwidth of T-R, we could obtain the approximate rate of T from L-2(H-d) to L-2( H-d) at an ideal rate.
paper_title: Pseudo-annular decomposition and approximate rate of Calderon-Zygmund operators on Heisenberg group
